item.title: Case Study: Perfect Paper Plc
item.description: With reference to the Tannenbaum Schmidt continuum and Blake Mouton Grid, analyze what type of manager Jayne is. (9m) Jayne has received instructions from her superiors and has made a decision to remedy the situation.

item.title: Case Study: Stakeholders
item.description: The local community would stand to benefit from Roxio’s offerings. The availability of food, clothing, electronics and other basic items would improve the quality of life in the local area.
